attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for sexual predators
attributes.additional_details:
We need to keep our children safe from this disgusting behaviour.
We need longer prison sentences for those who make indecent images. 

Please sign this petition if you agree.
attributes.background:
Too many sex offenders are getting protection after they have sexual assaulted a child
Too many are giving short sentences for having indecent pictures of children.
Or even no sentence at all. 
Online predators with the intention of sexually engagement with a child need longer sentences.
